be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers

Class FileSelectorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g03.controllers.FileSelectorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSelectorViewController.ViewListener

    public class FileSelectorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileSelectorViewController.ViewListener
    Handle the logic of selecting a file for an import or an export. This class is the listener of the FileSelectorViewController.ViewListener.
    This will manage the interaction on the FileSelectorView.fxml view.
